data.title: Carlow University
data.meta_description: Carlow University, a Catholic institution in Pittsburgh, PA, offers 90+ undergraduate and graduate programs with online and accelerated options. Inquire today.
data.text:
Devoted to the

Future of Healing

Carlow healthcare graduates are the leaders and healers our world needs, right now. Not just experts in technical skills, they excel in communication, bedside manner, empathy, teamwork, social justice and ethics. It’s the training in the habits of the heart that allows our students to act above and beyond their technical responsibilities, advocate for their patients, and work to create more a just and merciful world

Learn More

Devoted to the

Future of Expression

Carlow's fine arts, writing, and humanities graduates are different than other college graduates. Through exploring quintessentially human forms of expression and communication, they materialize social justice in interesting and interactive ways. Most importantly, they create original work that helps to create a more just and merciful world.

Learn More

Devoted to the

Future of Discovery

Skilled and compassionate people with a deeper understanding of teaching and service: these are Carlow education, math and science graduates. We don't just train teachers and STEM professionals; we dismantle educational barriers and empower our graduates to effect change in underserved areas, creating new ways to thrive in community. So upon graduation, they emerge as a different kind of human - the kind our world needs.

Learn More

Devoted to the

Future of Leadership

It’s anything but business as usual in Carlow’s leadership programs. Our graduates know how to shape public policy with mercy, lead healthcare organizations with compassion, incorporate ethics into technology, and bring truth to data. They aren’t simply prepared to become leaders in their fields, Carlow MBAs are global leaders creating a more just and merciful world.

Learn More

Devoted to the

Future of Service

How do we address unmet needs, unjust structures and dehumanizing situations in practical ways? Carlow service and social work graduates know how. They enter the workforce with a sense of their own purpose, an empathetic regard for others, and a devotion to mercy and justice in every field.

Learn More
